landingPage.title: Welcome to the Questionnaire
landingPage.description: This questionnaire gathers your opinions on various audio stimuli for a research study. In each trial, you'll listen to a set of audio clips and select the clips you perceive as having the most warmth and the most cold. Your feedback helps us understand listener preferences and guides future improvements.

steps.listen: Listen: Play each of the provided audio clips.
steps.select: Select: Identify the audio clips with the most warmth and the most cold in each trial.
steps.submit: Submit: Confirm your selections and proceed to the next trial.

landingPage.finalNote: This study is conducted as part of my senior project at FIBO KMUTT and is exclusively for research purposes.
landingPage.nameError: Please enter your name to continue.
landingPage.consentText: I consent to the collection and use of my data for research purposes.

questionnaire.resultsMessage: Here are the final rankings of the stimuli based on your selections:
questionnaire.selectBoth: Please select both the Most Warmth and the Most Cold.
questionnaire.sameSelection: Most Warmth and Most Cold cannot be the same!
